subject: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
UNITED STATE BANK USA
WASHINTON DC NO.5786
WHITE DALLARS STREET 34321

We would like to inform you that the US government has issued an order

your name
was among the fraud victims who have lost so much money to African and
European scammers

dollars that is supposed to be transferred to you since the beginning
of these year 2023 which we have decided to contact you today on how
we can make the transaction to you as soon as possible and We advise
you to interrupt any further communication with you and anyone, you
will not be harmed.
These are three options that you have to choose for the release of your money.
(1) Through bank to bank transfer.
(2) home delivery.
(3) ATM Master Card.
(4) Cashier's Check.
We are waiting for your immediate reply with your details so that this
bank can immediately proceed with the transfer or delivery of your
money and serve you better.
FULL NAME.........................
COUNTRY/HOME ADDRESS .................
WHATSAPP NUMBER ................
TELEPHONE FAX..................
YOUR IDENTITY CARD
.............

Do not send money in advance to anyone from Europe or Africa for

Thank you for your bank details with us and we assure you a good and
perfect deal.
Congratulations.
Mr. JAMES MARK,
Executive Regional Manager,
US bank)jamesmark0158@gmail.com

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
Hello Mr. James Mark,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this situation, but also relieved that the US government is taking steps to rectify it.

I'm curious about the options you've provided for the release of my money. Could you please provide more details on how each option works? For instance, how long would a bank-to-bank transfer take? And what are the procedures involved in home delivery or receiving an ATM Master Card?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "interrupt any further with you and anyone"? I'm not sure I understand that part.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
Greetings,

Thanks for your Response, we can explain and you have the right to make
your choice from the options,

Bank to bank transfer will take only 48 hours before it can reflects your
bank account. And it will cost you a total fee of $1715.

It will take only two working days for the delivery of your ATM card but
you have to pay for the stamp duty fee and activation of the Card/delivery
fee will all cost you a total of $750 And you will be able to withdraw from
the ATM card daily limit of the Card is $10,000.

I hope you understand it very well. But first before we can proceed, you
have to reconfirm your full information as it listed below ðŸ‘‡

Best Regards

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your quick response and detailed explanation. It's really helpful to understand the process better. I'm intrigued by the bank transfer option, it seems quite efficient. 

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please clarify what the stamp duty fee is for? And why is there a need for activation of the card delivery fee? Also, could you explain more about the daily limit of the ATM card?

I appreciate your patience in answering my queries.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:

Secondly the activation of the Bank ATM card is to activate the ATM card so

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate the time you've taken to clarify these points for me. I'm a bit confused about the process though, could you please explain more about the stamp duty fee? How does it work and why is it necessary?

Also, regarding the activation of the ATM card, how exactly does that happen? Is there a specific procedure I need to follow?

I'm also curious about the delivery charges. Could you provide more information on how much they would be and how they are calculated?

Lastly, it's quite exciting to hear that the ATM card will be packaged with an Apple phone or a Rigns watch! That's very generous. Can I choose which one I want or is it randomly selected?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
Greetings

information as it's listed, And only then we can respond to your email.

Thank you

subject: Re: UNITED STATE BANK USA
body:
